name: UE4 Asset Demos
description:
Description is a WIP.

Current version only has Super Athletic, which can be found here:

https://bit.ly/2D1w8gY

This asset would not have been possible without public domain (CC0) content. You can find links to the original sounds and textures here:

  • Coin sound OpenGameArt
  • Rock texture CC0Textures
  • Smear texture CC0Textures
  • Fight Music OpenGameArt
  • Wilheim Wikimedia
